name: Bad Day
description: Bad Day - an endless free to play runner with unique combination of 2D graphics and 3D environment. Compete with players from all around the world. But do not forget that the difficulty increases as you progress through.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any with 1024 Mb VRAM and DX10 support DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Use 16:9 or 16:10 monitors for better game experience
